mapper.sql: id, organization_id, organization_name, department_id, department_name, group_id, group_name, employee_id, employee_name, performance, order_amounts, new_customer_counts, report_date
mapper.select:
select count(1) from ( select dp.id, dp.employee_id, e.`name` as employee_name, (select g.`name` from group_info g where g.id = e.group_id) as group_name, (select g.`name` from group_info g where g.id = e.department_id) as department_name, (select g.`name` from group_info g where g.id = e.organization_id) as organization_name, sum(dp.performance) as performance, sum(dp.order_amounts) as order_amounts, sum(dp.new_customer_counts) as new_customer_counts from dept_performance_info dp left join employee_info e on dp.employee_id = e.id
group by dp.employee_id order by employee_name ) a

select dp.id, dp.employee_id, e.`name` as employee_name, (select g.`name` from group_info g where g.id = e.group_id) as group_name, (select g.`name` from group_info g where g.id = e.department_id) as department_name, (select g.`name` from group_info g where g.id = e.organization_id) as organization_name, sum(dp.performance) as performance, sum(dp.order_amounts) as order_amounts, sum(dp.new_customer_counts) as new_customer_counts from dept_performance_info dp left join employee_info e on dp.employee_id = e.id
group by dp.employee_id order by employee_name

select dp.id, dp.employee_id, e.`name` as employee_name, (select g.`name` from group_info g where g.id = e.group_id) as group_name, (select g.`name` from group_info g where g.id = e.department_id) as department_name, (select g.`name` from group_info g where g.id = e.organization_id) as organization_name, sum(dp.performance) as performance, sum(dp.order_amounts) as order_amounts, sum(dp.new_customer_counts) as new_customer_counts from dept_performance_info dp left join employee_info e on dp.employee_id = e.id
group by dp.employee_id order by performance desc
